verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] secured the release of three Americans held prisoner in North Korea , a goodwill gesture by Kim Jong - un ahead of his planned summit with President Donald Trump .

[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: secured] [ARG1: the release of three Americans held prisoner in North Korea] , a goodwill gesture by Kim Jong - un ahead of his planned summit with President Donald Trump .

President Trump has secured the release of [ARG1: three Americans] [V: held] [ARGM-PRD: prisoner] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] , a goodwill gesture by Kim Jong - un ahead of his planned summit with President Donald Trump .
